comments:
The NullPointerException shown below is thrown when select a URLTest and select Run As -> Test .  Everything seems to work OK, however.

Reproduce this error by following these steps:
1.  Start eclipse with -consolelog 
2. Open Test perspective
3.  Open CVS perspective
2.  Check out org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.tests project from CVS (in the test-results/test module)
3.  You will see this error in the console log.

Another way to reproduce is to:
1.  open eclipse with -consolelog flag
2.  open test perspective
3.  perform a recording/testgen/codegen on the test
4.  right click on test and select Run As-> Test
5.  You will see error in console.

Reassign to Bianca.

It looks like a change for the default value of verdict on TPFExecutionResult to null instead of inconclusive to distinguish between tests that didn't complete, and ones that were reported as inconclusive may have caused this.
Fixed by rolling back change to TPFExecutionResultImpl for bug 144045.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
